entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate purpose of Logger.LogBlock calls #55685
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Allow access to Compilation that matches a C# Hot Reload #55683
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • [Coming soon] Require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK for Roslyn development #55680
    Area-Infrastructure, Concept-Continuous Improvement
  • Invert If refactoring is missing unit tests for Visual Basic #55677
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, untriaged
  • Store custom evaluation flags on DkmClrValue data items instead of flowing them thru inspection context #55676
    Interactive-Debugging, Backlog
  • Switch case after `or` pattern does not match #55668
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Nullable references checks and params arrays #55666
    Question, Area-Compilers, Area-External, Resolution-Answered, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Using property marked with MemberNotNullWhen to a NotNull value doesn't get rid of the warning #55664
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations, untriaged
  • Constant, frequent crash VS 16.11 with Source Generator use #55658
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Closed

  • Support analysis scope configuration from Solution Explorer #52768
    Area-Analyzers, Feature Request, 17.0
  • String interpolation refactoring doesn't work on Console.WriteLine #55053
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, 17.0
  • [Complete] Require .NET 6 Preview 6 SDK for Roslyn development #55062
    Area-Infrastructure, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • 🥳 🎉 [Complete] Requiring the use of VS 2022 for Roslyn development #54830
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline parameter hint is shown for array indexing which isn't really necessary #46614
    help wanted, Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints, 17.0
  • `Convert to record struct` should not partially duplicate record's features #54897
    help wanted, Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • CS8604 report possible null reference despite sufficient null checks have been performed with two variables #55678
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Regression: SyntaxNode.ReplaceNode throws InvalidCastException #55673
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Allow access to Compilation that matches a C# Hot Reload #55683
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0
  • Investigate purpose of Logger.LogBlock calls #55685
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused interface #55684
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55682
    Area-IDE
  • Update Arcade and require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK #55681
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers
  • Move inheritance margin to its own view margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55670
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Have add-using respect EditorBrowsable attributes. #55669
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Pass updated types to ManagedHotReloadUpdate #55661
    Area-Interactive
  • testing crash in error reporting #55657
    Area-IDE
  • Prevent exception if their is no else block. #55656
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update packages version #55655
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • ✨ Support a solution-specific analysis scope set through Solution Explorer #52789
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid conflicting values of DkmEvaluationFlags #55675
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Update codestyle analyzer #55646
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix interpolated string refactoring to work for Console.Write* #55521
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Inline Hints: Option added for array indexing #55573
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints, Next
  • Generate minimal canonical records from tuples #55335
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude binaries provided by runtime from vsix #55640
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow OOP features to sync only the subset of projects they need for functioning #55426
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55660
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55659
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Update Arcade and require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK #55681
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused interface #55684
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55682
    Area-IDE
  • Use string.Format when an interpolated string part is dynamic #55642
    Area-Compilers
  • testing crash in error reporting #55657
    Area-IDE
  • Add Reference refactoring and imports #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers
  • Move inheritance margin to its own view margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE
  • Prevent exception if their is no else block. #55656
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE
  • Update packages version #55655
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Change Inheritance Margin Header style #55533
    Area-IDE
  • Treat overload with Delegate parameter as not applicable if lambda delegate type cannot be inferred #55357
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Pass updated types to ManagedHotReloadUpdate #55661
    Area-Interactive
  • Have add-using respect EditorBrowsable attributes. #55669
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55670
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash for top-level in unused value analyzer #51761
    Area-IDE
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE
